# llms.txt for staywinnipeg.ca
# This file helps LLMs understand the structure and content of this website

# Site Information
Site: https://staywinnipeg.ca
Purpose: Vacation rental listing for a mid-century modern Airbnb in Winnipeg's Corydon neighborhood
Owner: David

# Main Pages
Home: https://staywinnipeg.ca/
Blog: https://staywinnipeg.ca/blog.html

# Key Content Pages
- /blog-corydon-guide.html - Guide to Corydon Avenue neighborhood
- /blog-exchange-district.html - Information about Winnipeg's Exchange District
- /blog-family-activities.html - Family-friendly activities in Winnipeg
- /blog-human-rights-museum.html - Canadian Museum for Human Rights guide
- /blog-peanut-park.html - Information about Enderton (Peanut) Park
- /blog-restaurants.html - Winnipeg restaurant recommendations
- /blog-the-forks.html - The Forks market and area guide
- /blog-things-to-do.html - Things to do in Winnipeg
- /blog-transportation.html - Getting around Winnipeg
- /blog-winnipeg-art-gallery.html - Winnipeg Art Gallery information
- /blog-winnipeg-folk-festival.html - Winnipeg Folk Festival guide
- /blog-winnipeg-guest-guide.html - Comprehensive guest guide for Winnipeg
- /blog-winnipeg-murals.html - Winnipeg murals and street art
- /blog-winnipeg-winter-activities.html - Winter activities in Winnipeg

# Property Information
Property Name: Corydon Cute & Stylish
Type: Mid-century modern 3-bedroom vacation rental
Location: Corydon neighborhood, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada
Airbnb Listing: https://www.airbnb.ca/rooms/716340250371431352
Registration: STRA-2025-2600298

# Key Features
- Mid-century modern design
- 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
- Located in Corydon neighborhood
- Over 40 5-star reviews
- Superhost and Guest Favorite status
- Family-friendly
- Pet-friendly (dogs welcome)

# Main Keywords
Primary: Winnipeg Airbnb, vacation rental Winnipeg, Corydon neighborhood
Secondary: mid-century modern Winnipeg, Winnipeg accommodation, things to do Winnipeg

# Contact
Booking: Available through Airbnb at https://www.airbnb.ca/rooms/716340250371431352
